keywords: ['folk song', 'indian song', 'tabla', 'guitar', 'two chord song', 'female voice', 'moderate tempo', 'story-telling mood']
caption: This folk song features a female voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by a tabla playing the percussion. A guitar strums chords. For most parts of the song, only one chord is played. At the last bar, a different chord is played. This song has minimal instruments. This song has a story-telling mood. This song can be played in a village scene in an Indian movie.
